import requests

url = "https://simonwalker-magento-language-and-currency-switcher-v1.p.rapidapi.com/http://www.magentocommerce.com/magento-connect/geo-ip-language-currency-switcher.html"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "simonwalker-magento-language-and-currency-switcher-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
